TopicTitle: Wheels with no traction / traction lag(?) causing rovers and planes to do donuts on runway. (KSP 1.3.1)

Articles.Content:
getting no friction or grip with my wheels causing my rovers and space planes to either flip over or just slide around the place and drift... 

 

is this a bug with my modded install or 1.3.1 in general?

 

I've put my ksp log up anyway if you need anything else just ask.

 

KSP log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ndmh4cacjt40v8a/output_log.txt?dl=0
